name: Flowerboys
description:
This game serves as a lighthearted platformer where the main characters main objective is to push the flower through the path filled with objects and get it to reach the coin objective at the very end. The bright colors and childlike assets are used to evoke nostalgia and a sense of carefreeness within the game.

Credits: David Cohen for Build of Level and object assets

Bayat Games for asset package used "Free Platform Game Assets"
